item.title: Cryptography - Modular Arithmetic
item.description: Introduction # What happens when the hour hand of your wall clock crosses 12?

item.title: Cryptography - Euclidean Algorithm
item.description: Introduction # In the previous blog, we did a general introduction to cryptography and the various important libraries and techniques for handling encrypted data with python.

item.title: Cryptography - The Basics
item.description: Introduction # I spent the better part of the start of my year doing a lot of problem-solving with Python (secretly preparing for interviews :D ).

item.title: Secure Code Review - Path Traversal Bugs
item.description: Introduction # In the second part of the secure code review series, we look at path traversal bugs.

item.title: Secure Code Review - Hash Length Extension Attack
item.description: Introduction # Welcome to the secure code review series, where we take a closer look at different types of code and evaluate them based on potential security vulnerabilities.

item.title: Symbolic Execution with Angr - part 2
item.description: Overcoming path explosion, injecting bitvectors into symbolic registers using angr

item.title: Symbolic Execution with Angr - part 1
item.description: An overview of the binary analysis python framework angr in performing symbolic execution.

item.title: Zip Slip Vulnerability - Justctf 2022
item.description: An overview of the zip slip vulnerability in a python application.
